Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Requires the parole board to make a verbatim record of each parole release interview and revocation hearing within forty-five days after such interview or hearing
Summary: Requires that the parole board provide for the making of a verbatim record of each parole release interview and each preliminary or final revocation hearing within forty-five days after such interview or hearing; removes certain exceptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the parole board to make a verbatim record of each parole release interview or revocation hearing within forty-five days after such interview or hearing
